title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Strengthening Clinical Problem-Solving Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Knowledge and Clinical Practice Experience
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive course conducted in a smartphone-based limited technology environment, designed to bridge the gap between clinical practice and theoretical learning.

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more key problem elements by analyzing real clinical cases.
Learners can propose appropriate diagnostic and treatment plans for given clinical scenarios with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can improve their problem-solving process through iterative cycles (2+ times) incorporating peer feedback and tutor evaluation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
